name: GlamST LLC
description: Provider of an omni-channel services intended to provide an Augmented Reality platform for Beauty thru Virtual Try-on. The company's omni-channel services provides limitless sample experience and turn beauty advisors into experts, enabling women to try on makeup of any brand, from anywhere.
one_liner: Provider of an omni-channel services intended to provide an Augmented Reality platform for Beauty thru Virtual Try-on. The company's omni-channel services provides limitless sample experience and turn beauty advisors into experts, enabling women to try on makeup of any brand, from anywhere.
